Make a booking

BOOK YOUR SMALL WEDDING

BOOK NOW

Wedding packages

Accommodation for 40 people

We Offer:

  • Indoor chapel in case of rain
  • Garden for photos
  • Beach 400m for photos
  • Sole use of the whole premises and all facilities exclusively (Excluding pixie village and nursery )
VIEW DETAILS

Book now!

Excluding PEAK SEASON Catering and meals available on request(spit braai/buffets). Photos can be arranged in the Pixie and Fairy Village upon request.

Friday 14h00 – Monday 11h00 R20 000.00 (4 days/3 nights)

Saturday / Sunday whole day – R12 000.00

Alternative Sunday from 12:00 -22:00 R6 000.00 venue only

Clean up of venue at request R500.00

Catering and meals are available on request(spit braai/buffets).

Photos can be arranged in the Pixie and Fairy Village upon request

Enquire about mid-week wedding specials.

VIEW DETAILS

Step 1: Fill out the below booking form

Step 1: Fill out the booking form

Step 2: Secure your booking

GET IN TOUCH WITH US

+27 73 302 5835

Plot 307, Jacobs Bay, Saldanha, Saldanha Bay Municipality 7380 South Africa

GET IN TOUCH WITH US

For any and all enquiries, please get in touch with us on +27 73 302 5835 or send us an enquiry

CONTACT US
Copyright © 2025 Jacobs bay accommodations

Quick Contact

ADDRESS: Plot 307, Jacobs Bay, 7380

PHONE: +27 73 302 5835
